reviews.review:
This film did an amazing job and blending all the past films into one film.  It gives enough time for everyone and swaps between everyone enough to keep you on your toes while not completely forgetting others exist.  Infinity War, if i'm being picky, has one minor flaw and that is that the Russo's directed GotG scenes and not Gunn.  They just don't get the same performance out of that cast that James Gunn seems to.  Quill as a character in this film was SUPER annoying, which made his scenes really irritating and hard to care about.  Even at the end of the film i was like 'meh' to him, even though he is probably my second or third favorite MCU character,  But his lack was Thor's gain.  Thor honestly makes this film(about darn time) even more awesome - i just wish that he got more time with Hulk - since Ragnarok was so good with their relationship.  This movie has wide reaching ramifications all around, and after viewing it is that made clear why only two more films are dropping in the meantime until the forth installment comes.  
Check it out in the theater for sure, probably worth extra views to see everything.

Best movie in marvel cinematic universe yet. The end actually leaves you yearning for more. Thanos is every bit dominating as I would expect of the most powerful villain in marvel cinematic universe. Planning to watch it again soon ??

EN DÉPIT D'UNE FORMULE TRÈS CLASSIQUE ET D'UN HUMOUR TOUJOURS AUSSI MAL UTILISÉ, AVENGERS INFINITY WAR S'AVÈRE UN BLOCKBUSTER EXTRÊMEMENT EFFICACE GRÂCE À NOTAMMENT SON MÉCHANT QUI ÉCRASE PROBABLEMENT TOUT LES AUTRES DU MCU ET ON NE PEUT QU'AVOIR HÂTE AUX PROCHAINS FILMS DES STUDIOS MARVEL.

Several comic book movies attempt to capture the feel of the source material and the essence of its characters, but few succeed. The Russo Brothers, on the other hand, have, for the third time in a row, achieved another masterful adaptation. Along with engaging performances, colorful visuals, and exhilarating action sequences, Avengers: Infinity War delivers an unexpected conclusion to the 10-year long saga of the MCU.
I am not kidding when I say this movie was the best experience of my life and also the boldest movie I've ever seen!

Being the darkest MCU entry yet, not once does it fall into being one dark mess. Just enough levity to keep it from falling into dreadful territory, it never takes away the sense of doom. This is indeed Thanos' story, but not once does it take away from the Avengers, now joined by the Guardians of the Galaxy. However, if you haven't seen some, if not most of the MCU movies, you won't enjoy it as much.
I have no words. This movie just blew my mind. After 10 years and 18 other marvel movies this was definitely worth the wait. Can’t wait to rewatch it. And Thanos is freakin amazing! What a guy.
